metadata.title: CVE-2021-23995 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: When Responsive Design Mode was enabled, it used references to objects thatwere previously freed. We presume that with enough effort this could havebeen exploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects FirefoxESR < 78.10, Thunderbird < 78.10, and Firefox < 88.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
